introduction: Mafiosos. Murder Inc. Cops. Rats. Titans of organized crime no longer carry the weight their predecessors once did...but that hardly matters with the rise of the Dibiassi Crime Family...When a prominent judge is murdered, a young FBI agent is tasked with taking extraordinary measures in order to infiltrate the inner circle of the notorious crime family responsible for the unsanctioned mob-style hit... a return to the blood years...a throwback to the Philly mob when its streets ran red with blood.
